title: Construction cost per kilometer of high-speed line in France 2014
yAxis: Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros for 8 number of High-speed Lines.
The maximum Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros 19.7 is found at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and the minimum is found at LGV Paris-Lyon where High-speed Line is 5.5.
The highest High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean has 14.2 more Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros than the lowest High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros for 8 number of High-speed Lines.
The maximum Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros 19.7 is found at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and the minimum is found at LGV Paris-Lyon where High-speed Line is 5.5.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros for 8 number of High-speed Lines.
The maximum Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros 19.7 is found at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and the minimum is found at LGV Paris-Lyon where High-speed Line is 5.5.
The highest High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean has 14.2 more Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros than the lowest High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
max_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing High-speed Line, and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in each High-speed Line on the y axis.
High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean has the highest Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros and LGV Paris-Lyon has the lowest Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros.
The minimum High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon has got 3.58 times less Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros than the maximum High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean.

The High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean has the highest Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros, followed by LGV Rhine-Rhone, and LGV East. Down to the High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon which is the lowest.
The High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon tends to be 1.45 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all High-speed Lines, we get total 108.5.
